home.description: Your top albums, now in art form! Create a collage with your most listened albums from your Last.fm profile.
home.integrationTitle: Haven't connected your Spotify to Last.fm yet?
home.integrationDescription: For your Spotify songs to be registered and appear in the collage, you need to connect your account to Last.fm.
home.collage3x3Description: A compact grid with your 9 most listened albums. Perfect for highlighting your last.fm favorites of the week.
home.collage4x4Description: A balance between variety and size. Perfect for your top album of the month from last.fm.
home.collage5x5Description: For the most intense listeners! Show 25 albums from your last.fm in a single image, ideal for your entire history.

metadata.title: ScrobbleWall – Your music in art form
metadata.description: Transform your most listened albums from Last.fm into personalized visual collages. Share your musical passion with the world!
metadata.ogTitle: ScrobbleWall – Your music in art form
metadata.ogDescription: Create collages with your most listened albums on Last.fm and share your musical identity.
metadata.twitterTitle: ScrobbleWall – Your music in art form
